comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description: To let students have basic understanding of formal semantics and other areas of semantics.
goals: To let students have basic understanding of formal semantics and other areas of semantics.
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course aims to give students fundamental ideas of formal semantics.Studies in areas such as lexical semantics, aspect, tense, modality, and framesemantics will also be discussed.

**Requirements and Evaluation**    

Presentation           20%

Term paper              30%

tests                      40%

Attendance, Participation, etc.   10%

**Schedule**                                                                        

Week 1    Introduction

Week 2    Kearns Ch. 1: Introduction;

Week 3     Lehrer1992: Names and Naming: Why We Need Fields and Frames

Week 4    Heine & Narrog Ch.18: Natural Semantic Metalanguage (pp.459-468) & Tai 1994: Chineseclassifier systems and      human categorization

Week 5  Kearns Ch.2: First Order Logic

Week 6 Kearns Ch.3 Modality and Possible Worlds

Week 7  Li Ch. 2.1-2.4.1: Typologyand Modality (pp.12-19)

Week 8  Test 1

Week 9   Kearns ch.7: Tense and Aspect

Week 10  Kearns Ch.9: Aspectual Classes of Events

Week 11 Smith Ch.11 The Aspectual System of Mandarin Chinese

Week 12 Saeed Ch.11: Cognitive Semantics   (Term paper outline due)

Week 13   Kearns Ch.10 Thematic Roles Reviewed 

Week 14 Kearns Ch.4: Negative Polarity items 

Week 15 Kearns Ch. 5: Definite Descriptions

Week 16  Test 2

Week 17  Holiday

Week 18    **Term paper presentation**

**1/15         Term paper due**
